page.title: 03In The News
page.content:
We visited the East Anglian Daily Times and spoke to Mr.Cocksedge,the manager.We asked him what the main headlines were this year. They are: A 3 million pounds leisure pool to be built. A 1 million pounds Eastern by-pass to be built. It will be 1 mile long and will take through traffic from Sudbury. The sewers are in danger of collapsing under the weight of our waste. Sudbury Rugby Club had a fire which destroyed the clubhouse causing damage costing 10,000 pounds. The building of Lavenham church, 500yrs ago is being celebrated by the Spryngs family.
By: Sarah Mowle and Tina Steele.
